p: In animal feed, the fresh leaves of M. oleifera have a positive effect, being as they stimulate the increase in the level of efficiency in the use of metabolizable energy by increasing microbial activity as well as a greater efficiency in the use of energy from pastures [ 52]. There are several experiences of including fresh M. oleifera fodder in the feed of different animal species such as goats, sheep, cows, birds, and pigs [ 34, 52, 53, 54]. Positive effects are reported on the productive behavior of goats and sheep, increases in the quality of cowâ€™s milk, a greater contribution of protein in pigs, and an improvement in the weight gain of sheep.
